Package cpsc2150.extendedTicTacToe.models

Interface IGameBoard

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbsGameBoard, GameBoard, GameBoardMem
    public interface IGameBoard
    This interface contains the methods that will be implemented in the GameBoard class.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumRows

        int getNumRows()
        This method returns the number of rows on the board.
        Returns:
        returns MAX_ROW
        Pre:
        NONE
        Post:
        getNumRows = MAX_ROW

      • getNumColumns

        int getNumColumns()
        This method returns the number of columns on the board.
        Returns:
        returns MAX_COL
        Pre:
        NONE
        Post:
        getNumColumns = MAX_COL

      • getNumToWin

        int getNumToWin()
        This method returns the number of tokens in a row needed to win.
        Returns:
        returns numToWin
        Pre:
        NONE
        Post:
        getNumToWin = numToWin

      • checkSpace

        default boolean checkSpace​(BoardPosition pos)
        This method checks to see if space on the board is available.
        Returns:
        returns true if space is available, false otherwise.
        Pre:
        0 <= pos.getRow() < MAX_ROW AND 0 <= pos.getColumn() < MAX_COL
        Post:
        checkSpace = true AND FALSE otherwise
        Parameters:
        pos - The position on the board.

      • placeMarker

        void placeMarker​(BoardPosition pos,
                 char player)
        This method places a marker on the board.
        Pre:
        checkSpace(pos) = true
        Post:
        board[pos.getRow()][pos.getColumn()] = player
        Parameters:
        pos - The position on the board.
        player - The player's marker.

      • checkForWinner

        default boolean checkForWinner​(BoardPosition lastPos)
        This method checks to see if the game is won.
        Returns:
        returns true if the game is won
        Pre:
        checkSpace(lastPos) = false AND lastPos.getRow() < getNumRow AND lastPos.getColumn() < getNumColumn
        Post:
        checkForWinner = true if checkForVerticalWin OR checkForHorizontalWin OR checkForDiagonalWin = true AND false otherwise
        Parameters:
        lastPos - The last position on the board.

      • checkVerticalWin

        default boolean checkVerticalWin​(BoardPosition lastPos,
                                 char player)
        This method checks to see if the game is won.
        Returns:
        returns true if the game is won
        Pre:
        0 <= lastPos.getRow() < MAX_ROW AND 0 <= lastPos.getColumn() < MAX_COL
        Post:
        checkVerticalWin = true if [getNumRow of same char marker in a vertical row] AND checkVerticalWin = false if [getNumColumn of same char marker not in a vertical row]
        Parameters:
        lastPos - The last position on the board.

      • checkHorizontalWin

        default boolean checkHorizontalWin​(BoardPosition lastPos,
                                   char player)
        This method checks to see if the game is won.
        Returns:
        returns true if the game is won
        Pre:
        0 <= lastPos.getRow() < getNumRow AND 0 <= lastPos.getColumn() < getNumColumn
        Post:
        checkHorizontalWin = true if [getNumToWin of same char marker in a horizontal row] AND checkHorizontalWin = false if [getNumToWin of same char marker not in a horizontal row]
        Parameters:
        lastPos - The last position on the board.

      • checkDiagonalWin

        default boolean checkDiagonalWin​(BoardPosition lastPos,
                                 char player)
        This method checks to see if the game is won.
        Returns:
        returns true if the game is won
        Pre:
        0 <= lastPos.getRow() < getNumRows AND 0 <= lastPos.getColumn() < getNumColumns
        Post:
        checkDiagonalWin = true if [getNumToWin of same char marker in a diagonal row] AND checkDiagonalWin = false if [getNumToWin of same char marker not in a diagonal row]
        Parameters:
        lastPos - The last position on the board.

      • checkForDraw

        default boolean checkForDraw()
        This method checks to see if the game is tied.
        Returns:
        returns true if the game is tied
        Pre:
        0 <= lastPos.getRow() < getNumRow AND 0 <= lastPos.getColumn() < getNumColumn
        Post:
        checkForDraw = true if [board is full AND checkForWinner = false] AND checkForDraw = false if [board is not full OR checkForWinner = true]

      • whatsAtPos

        char whatsAtPos​(BoardPosition pos)
        This method returns what is in the board at a specific position.
        Returns:
        returns what is in the board at a specific position
        Pre:
        0 <= pos.getRow() < getNumRow AND 0 <= pos.getColumn() < getNumColumn
        Post:
        getBoardPosition = board[pos.getRow()][pos.getColumn()]
        Parameters:
        pos - The position on the board.

      • isPlayerAtPos

        default boolean isPlayerAtPos​(BoardPosition pos,
                              char playerChar)
        This method returns the player shows the players position.
        Returns:
        returns the player shows the players position
        Pre:
        0 <= pos.getRow() < getNumRow AND 0 <= pos.getColumn() < getNumColumn
        Post:
        playerAtPos = board[pos.getRow()][pos.getColumn()] == playerChar
        Parameters:
        pos - The position on the board.
        playerChar - The player's marker.
